basics.name: Imed Kouki
basics.label: RPA Developer & Automation Consultant | Master's Thesis Researcher
basics.summary: Designing and implementing process automation solutions using the UiPath Platform and Microsoft Power Automate that streamline business operations. Concurrently working as a Master's Thesis Researcher on agentic approaches for BPMN process model generation through multi-agent systems and prompt engineering.

work.name: TUI Group
work.summary: Remote / Sousse, Tunisia. Develop and maintain end-to-end automation workflows using UiPath Platform and Microsoft Power Automate.
highlights: Develop and maintain end-to-end automation workflows using UiPath Platform and Microsoft Power Automate (Desktop & Cloud), integrating APIs and data sources (SharePoint, Dataverse).
Delivered and supported over 7 automation projects built on diverse technology stacks, improving operational efficiency across multiple business units.
Collaborated with stakeholders to capture requirements, design technical documentation (PDDs, SDDs), and ensure alignment with process governance standards.
Implemented automation solutions that achieved a cumulative saving of more than 11 FTEs through process optimization and reduced manual workload.

work.name: LARIA, ENSI (University of Manouba)
work.summary: Manouba, Tunisia. Researching agentic approaches for process model generation.
highlights: Researching agentic approaches for process model generation (BPMN) using multi-agent systems.
Implemented solutions utilizing Langchain / LangSmith SDK and Mistral API.
Focusing on schema validation, systematic prompt engineering, and reliability in text-to-model synthesis.

work.name: ADACTIM — WEEVIO Group
work.summary: Ariana, Tunisia. Identified automation opportunities and created PDDs with BPMN diagrams for supervision processes.
highlights: Configured and deployed GLPI container using Docker and WSL2.
Developed, tested, and deployed UiPath automation workflows aligned with business requirements.

work.name: DRÄXLMAIER — Group SATS
work.summary: Siliana, Tunisia. Worked on switch configuration and Packet Tracer simulations.
highlights: Worked on switch configuration and Packet Tracer simulations.

projects.name: Text-to-Process Model Generation
projects.description: Developing agentic approaches for BPMN process model generation using multi-agent systems and prompt engineering. Leverages Mistral API and LangSmith SDK to ensure schema validation and reliability in text-to-model synthesis.

projects.name: SVD-Based ICP Algorithm
projects.description: Implementation of the Iterative Closest Point (ICP) algorithm, used for 3D point cloud registration.
